attributes.action: commit to not imposing statutory barriers to elderly driving but to support the idea of voluntary annual IAM assesment and training
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The vast majority of motorists over the age of 65 agree with the need to keep their skills up to date and would redily pay a small fee to be assesed / trained by IAM instructors. to make this a legal requirement would be`ageist` and simply another `tax` on the already overburdened motorist!
